mapper.select: select count(case when absent=1 then 1 end)absent, count(case when early=1 then 1 end)early, count(case when sick=1 then 1 end)sick, count(case when late=1 then 1 end)late from attendence where today = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') and classno=#{classno}

select s.stdno, s.name, a.absent, a.early, a.sick, a.late from (select stdno, name from student where classno=#{classno})s inner join attendence a on s.stdno=a.stdno and a.today=TO_DATE(#{today},'MM-DD-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')

select s.stdno, s.name, a.absent, a.early, a.sick, a.late from (select stdno, name from student where classno=#{classno})s inner join attendence a on s.stdno=a.stdno and a.today=to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
select * from attendence where today = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd') and classno=#{classno}
